ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_women] I'm playing again
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunately the politics begin to occur when you get into a guild. Especially at higher levels. In talking with players across other servers it is server
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunately the politics begin to occur when you get
into a guild. Especially at higher levels. In talking
with players across other servers it is server wide.
For example, the power struggles between "uber"
guilds, the planes and dragon rotations, also the egos
of many players once they hit the higher levels.

--- P MacKinnon <tash@...> wrote:
> A newbie question re server politics; what are they?
> Are there different 'cultures' on different
> servers? Is this a guild thing? Is there something
> I should look out for? <gulp>
>
> patti
>
>
> I've gone back to my old server to visit and that's
> nice, I always run
> into some old friends who say hi and chat with me.
> There are people I
> still care about on that old server. But, it seems
> like I have a barrier
> that prevents me from playing there. I just know if
> I play there that
> server politics will rear its ugly head again.
>
> So for now I will power level my little enchanter on
> Tholuxe, and see what
> it's like playing there.
>
> Christina
>
>
>
>

> ATTACHMENT part 2 application/ms-tnef
